headline: Xylem Inc. (XYL) Hit a 52 Week High, Can the Run Continue?
summary: Xylem (XYL) is at a 52-week high, but can investors hope for more gains in the future? We take a look at the company's fundamentals for clues.

headline: XYL Q3 Deep Dive: Margin Expansion and Portfolio Streamlining Drive Outlook Upward
summary: Water technology company Xylem (NYSE:XYL) reported Q3 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 7.8% year on year to $2.27 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $9 billion at the midpoint came in 0.5% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.37 per share was 11.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Compared to Estimates, Xylem (XYL) Q3 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Xylem (XYL) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.
